actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To exempt from the program ineligibility requirements of section 1221 of the Food Security Act of 1985 persons who produce an agricultural commodity on wetlands of two acres or less.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to exempt from agricultural benefits ineligibility persons who produce agricultural commodities on certain previously cropped wetland of two acres or less.

titles.title: To exempt from the program ineligibility requirements of section 1221 of the Food Security Act of 1985 persons who produce an agricultural commodity on wetlands of two acres or less.
